question: Write a letter to the manager of a cinema (movie theatre) about a jacket you have left behind after a film. In your letter:describe the jacketdescribe where you were seatedexplain what you want to be done
text: My name is Justine, and I was watching 'Top Boy' Friday night in your movie theatre. I am writing to inform you that I forgot my jacket inside one of your rooms.

I was out with my friends to watch the new famous film Top Boy. I was seated on seat 11P, right in the middle of the room. When the movie finished, I was literally crying because the finale scene was so magnificent. Hence, I believe I left behind my beloved jacket. It is a Superdry blue and green vest with hearts on both sides.
I would be very grateful if you could ask your employees to take a look at the room. I really love this piece of clothing and I wish to have it back.
Please contact me by email [email protected] if you have any clue.
Thank you a lot for your help,

error_list.error_des: It seems that preposition use may be incorrect here.
